Title: Requires police to advise persons under 18 years of age to their rights to silence and to any attorney before any custodial interrogation
Summary: Requires police to advise persons under 18 years of age of their rights to silence and to an attorney before any custodial interrogation.
LawCode: Amd §60.45, CP L; amd §344.2, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to requiring law enforcement authorities to advise persons under the age of eighteen years of certain rights when such persons are questioned while in custody
